Title: Rahman 1400
Writer: Saeid Shahi, Babak Kaydan, Meysam Kaydan
Actors: Bahram Afshari, Saeed Aghakhani, Sareh Bayat, Mohammad Reza Golzar
Plot: Rahman is the custodian of a company and the doctor has told him that he will die soon. He decides to with the help of his friend Anush make a plan and inherit some money for his family.
